title: Ep. 54: Your 20s v 30s: work, relationships, and what we’ve learned
itunes:title: Ep. 54: Your 20s v 30s: work, relationships, and what we’ve learned
description:
It's just us this episode!! We’re doing a little bit of self-reflection today, talking about the differences between being in your twenties versus your thirties. Hopefully, for those of you in your twenties, we can offer a little advice. And for those of you in your thirties with us, we know you’ll relate! From the difference in how we date now, to what we thought our lives would look like in our thirties, this episode was fun to reflect on.

Also in this episode, Becca is obsessed with organizing her new apartment, and Grace is obsessed with her new Veronica Beard jacket!

Sponsor:

  • Lola: For 40% off all subscriptions, go to mylola.com and enter code BOP at checkout.

Books Mentioned

Rules of Civility

The Overstory

Park Avenue Summer

Red White and Royal Blue

The Royal We

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?
